name: Pipilotti Rist
image: Pipilotti Rist at Fundació Joan Miró in Barcelona.jpg
alt: Pipilotti Rist at Fundació Joan Miró in Barcelona
caption: Fundació Joan Miró
training: Institute of Applied Arts, Schule für Gestaltung
works: Pepperminta, I'm Not The Girl Who Misses Much, Pickleporno, Ever is Over All
summary: Pipilotti Rist (born 21 June 1962 as Elisabeth Rist), is a visual artist who works with video, film, and moving images which are often displayed as projections.
